text: لا يسبقونه بالقول وهم بامره يعملون

translations.translation: They do not precede Him in speech and they act on His command.
They did not precede Him in their speech, and acted on His command.
They do not outstrip Him in speech and only act as He commands.
These servants do not speak before He speaks. They simply act according to His orders.
They do not speak before He has, and they act only at His command.
They speak not until He has spoken, and they act on His command.
They do not precede Him in speech and (only) according to His commandment do they act.
that outstrip Him not in speech, and perform as He commands.
They speak not until He hath spoken, and they act by His command.
they do not try to speak ahead of Him, and they act at His command.
They precede Him not in words, and by His command they work.
They do not venture to speak ahead of Him, and they act by His command.
They speak not before He speaks, and they act (in all things) by His Command.
They speak not until He has spoken, and they act on His Command.
who do not surpass Him in speech, and do as He commands.
They never speak before He has spoken, and they only act on His command.
They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.
[21:27] They do not [venture to] speak before Him — they only speak after He has spoken, and they act according to His command, that is, following [His issuing of] it.

(They speak not until He hath spoken) Gabriel does not go ahead of Michael, whether by words or acts, until He commands him, (and they act by His command) and they, i.e. the angels, say and do in accordance with Allah's command.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: لذلك { لاَ يَسْبِقُونَهُ بِٱلْقَوْلِ } أي: لا يبادرون إلى القول قبل قوله سبحانه، ولا يبدلون، ولا يغيرون قوله وحكمه، كما هو دأب العبيد مع المولى { وَ } كيف يسبقونه بالقول { هُمْ بِأَمْرِهِ يَعْمَلُونَ } [الأنبياء: 27] جميعَ ما عملوا من خيرٍ وشرٍ والمأمور لا يكون شريكاً للآمر

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: وأصله: لا يسبق قولُهم قولَه، ثم أسند السبق إليهم لمزيد تنزههم عن ذلك، { وهم بأمره يعملون } أي: لا يعملون إلا ما أمرهم به، وهو بيان لتبعيتهم له تعالى في الأفعال، إثر بيان تبعيتهم له في الأقوال، فإن نفي سبقيتهم له تعالى بالقول: عبارة عن تبعيتهم له تعالى فيه، كأنه قيل: هم بأمره يقولون وبأمره يعملون، لا بغير أمره أصلاً
